name: 黃秀英
objective:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
schedule:
1 Introduction
2 Concept or Stress
3 Stress and Strain-Axial Loading (1)
4 Stress and Strain-Axial Loading (2)
5 Torsion (1)
6 Torsion (2)
7 Torsion (3)
8 Pure Bending (1)
9 Midterm Exam
10 Pure Bending (2)
11 Analysis and Design of Beams for Bending
12 Shearing Stresses in Beams and Thin-Walled Members
13 Transformations of Stress and Strain (1)
14 Transformations of Stress and Strain (2)
15 Deflection of Beams
16 Columns
17 Review
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.　　平常考：20 %
2.　　期中考：25 %
3.　　期末考：30 %
4.　　作業：20 %
5.　　上課答問&出席率: 5 %
6.　　作業上課前收。作業遲交一天扣1分。
7.　　嚴禁抄襲，抄襲者0分。
materials:
使用課本：Mechanics of Materials 5th by Beer & Johnston
Publisher: Mc Graw Hill(東華書局代理)
任課教師: 黃秀英
Office Hours: 週二10:00-12:00, 1:00-5:00 (reference only)，但請先e-mail 或電話預約
Email: hhwang@mail.ntut.edu.tw
